title: Very Convenient
text: I just started school again and it helps to have the school emails straight to my phone with work and kids. 10/10 from me

title: Spellcheck
text: I liked the other outlook because I could right click and correct spelling or grammar issues.

title: Email
text: This is my work email and so far it has not disappeared me. It works as it should.

title: Great Service
text: Outlook has been a reliable means to communicate through email. Storage is great, service is good and easily accessible upon looking for help.

title: The Best App on the Market
text: I have tried them all and found this app was the best with no close second.

title: ok
text: i prefer google but in forced to use outlook for school so i might as wel

title: The best email app !!
text: Outlook stands out as the epitome of excellence in email management. Surpassing even the standard Apple Mail app, it offers unparalleled ease of navigation, efficient email flagging, marking as unread, and seamless email responses. Its intuitive user interface and streamlined user experience unequivocally establish it as the premier choice among email applications.

title: Logging out, unresponsive
text:
Constantly logging out, every time you open app you have to “add account” 
Is there a way to roll back a coupe versions to the working version??? Last update did not fix it either

title: Great app
text: Great app but would be outstanding with a few features similar to the Apple mailbox (send again being a big one). But it’s an easy app to use and works great, I’d be lost without outlook.

title: Reminders
text: Excellent and keeps reminding of all the messages and updates

title: Much better!!
text: I wrote a pretty scathing review several years back and this app has come a LONG way. I don’t really have any complaints now save one - stop auto populating the ‘Signature’ with your spam. Signature should be blank by default.

title: Review
text: Great safe easy email system

title: I loveit
text: I kind of love it, but it doesn’t tell me the notifications

title: When will the notification message preview be fixed?
text: 3-4 updates ago all of the sudden this app stopped showing message preview in notifications and just says open your app to view. I’ve checked ALL the settings and disabled and renabled notifications and it doesn’t work. Usually about 7-10 days it finally starts working in its own.

title: Does what it should.
text: Reliable. Easy to use.

title: student opinion
text:
i use outlook very often for middle school. it always notifies me whenever i’ve received an email and is very easy to use.
sometimes, it takes a while to refresh but maybe my phone is just slow. 
9.5/10 recommendation.

title: Okay Mail Reader
text: Gets the job done but interface is “clunky” and lacks a lot features.

title: Please improve the search function
text:
I get tons of email and I often have to search for an email on a specific topic. The search function seems to be hit or miss.

I have to often try two or three different search terms before I find the email I’m searching for. This needs to be fixed

title: Outlook is the best
text:
I really love and like the outlook and thanks to outlook cause it is offer the best things to its accounts holders.

Thanks you outlook

title: Outlook
text: Works well on phone but touch screen doesn’t work on iPad Air. Could’ve had five stars.

title: Almost Great
text: Love the app but please get rid of the “read more” and let me scroll through emails in their entirety without having to click on the button.

title: No Email Previews
text: After the last update, I lost my outlook email previews.  I see I have a new email but the previews are not seen. I have checked all the notification settings.  Please help.

title: Outlook at work
text: This email system is working incredibly. I love using outlook for work. Easy to use with great options.

title: The best
text: Enjoy it tremendously!!

title: Widget stopped working
text: The Outlook app itself is quite nice but one issue is that the widget on the home page has stopped working as of Monday 26th Feb and is not advancing. Removal and reinsertion of the widget just gives an empty widget
